channel.title: Students List on Chao ZHOU
channel.description: Recent content in Students List on Chao ZHOU

item.title: Hanxiao WANG
item.description: My Info Currently, I am a Research Fellow at National University of Singapore, working with the Department of Mathematics. My research focuses on stochastic control, stochastic analysis and mathematical finance. I received my Ph.D. in 2020 at Fudan University (in China) on my thesis about backward stochastic Volterra integral equations and stochastic linear-quadratic optimal control problems. Before I started my Ph.D. program, I had received a Bachelor degree in Jilin University (in China).

item.title: Huafu LIAO
item.description: My Info I am currently a Research Fellow in National University of Singapore. My research interests are in credit risk, optimal porfolio selection with regime switching, and neural network. I received my Ph.D Degree in Mathematics from University of Science and Technology of China in 2019. My Ph.D thesis studies a class of dynamical models on credit portfolio with regime-switching and default contagion, utilizing recursive HJB system and BSDE with jumps.

item.title: Jiayu SHI
item.description: My Info I am a Ph.D. student at the National University of Singapore, under the supervision of Prof. ZHOU Chao and Prof. TOH Kim-Chuan. CV Email: shi.jiayu@u.nus.edu

item.title: Tang Siu Hin
item.description: My Info I am a PhD student at NUS under the supervision of Dr. Chao ZHOU. Email: s.h.tang@u.nus.edu CV

item.title: Mengge LI
item.description: I am a PhD candidate at the National University of Singapore, under the supervision of Dr. Chao ZHOU. My Info Email: li.mengge@u.nus.edu CV

item.title: Junbeom Lee
item.description: Bio Currently, I am a Quant Trader at Yuanta Securities(Seoul, South Korea) I was a research fellow working with the Department of Mathematics in the National University of Singapore. I received my Ph.D. in 2018 on my thesis about XVA. Before I started my Ph.D. program, I had worked for a finance company as a quant for 2 years. My Info Email: junbeoml22@gmail.com Github LinkedIn CV

item.title: Meixia LIN
item.description: Ph.D student in Department of Mathematics, under the supervision of Kim-Chuan TOH and Chao ZHOU. My Info Email: lin_meixia@u.nus.edu CV

item.title: Tan Hong Ming
item.description: Bio I am a PhD candidate at the Institute of Operations Research and Analytics, IORA, NUS. My research interest is decision making under uncertainty, bayesian learning, pricing revenue management, and sport analytics. I am interested to learn about the optimal actions people or companies should take when faced with uncertainty about the consequences of events. I mainly use analytical models to approach my research questions. My Info Email: thm@u.

item.title: Xizhi Su
item.description: Bio I am a PhD student at the National University of Singapore. My advisors are Dr. Chao Zhou and Prof Min Dai. My current research projects are portfolio optimization under information frictions and singular controls applied in finance. I am also interested in applications of deep neural networks. Before coming to Singapore, I have completed a Master’s degree from Part III at Cambridge University. My essay advisor was Professor Frank P.
